name: Blocky Bot
overview: Super 3D Platform Mini Arcade Action! Jump your way through a wacky world of robots, wizards, ninjas and the first ever playable box of robotic French fries! Blocky Bot is a brand-new super action mini-platformer for Wii U, from the same team that brought you Paper Monsters Recut. Test your platforming skills and reflexes by collecting Bits and Bytes to unlock new characters and themes, and push yourself for the best score and blocky bragging rights! Endless 3D platformer gameplay combined with awesome robot style Tons of original characters to unlock and play, and a few surprise appearances! Awesome original soundtrack, filled with epic new blocky jams Super-sweet themes to unlock and explore! Endless hours of replay and high-score fun Wii U GamePad support, including Off-TV Play! Fun for gamers of any age
